resources.string: This application contains a home page with its title, a navigation button, a field where text can be entered along with a send button, and four icons in a grid view. If a user enters text into the text field, then hits send, a secondary activity will be displayed where the text which was entered is shown. If the user clicks on the top left grid view icon, they will be taken to a RecyclerView list of different zombie movies, which can be clicked on to learn further information about which ever movie. Thanks for checking it out!
